attributes.action: approach the trustees of the RBSG Pension Fund to cease paying any more pension to Sir Fred Goodwin on the basis that he has not only wrecked the group through his strategic direction but ruined the savings and remuneration packages of its staff, ruined the savings and investments of its pensioners and it is grossly unfair that he now be allowed to plunder our pension fund through payments to him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would ask all pensioners of the Royal Bank of Scotland Group to sign this petition to signify their feeling that Sir Fred Goodwin should have been dismissed with no pension or benefits as a result of his policies. Sir Fred did not believe in reward for failure and it is not therefore appropriate for him to be rewarded for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
